text: Sir John Ini Lapli, GCMG (12 June 1955 â€“ 18 January 2025) was the Governor- General of the Solomon Islands from 7 July 1999 until 7 July 2004. Lapli died on 18 January 2025 at the age of 69.Late Sir John Ini Lapli laid to rest ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Governors- General of Solomon Islands
